full_output.summary: To be associated with a progressive organization which can provide me with a dynamic work sphere to extract my inherent technical skills, seek excellent opportunities, and expand my knowledge and also can attain my career targets in the progress.

projects.name: MY INDIA PROJECT
projects.description: This is a project based on the environment and forest sectors of India. The project explained about the objectives, preservation and the steps taken by the gOvernment to protect the environment and forest sectors in India.

projects.name: A STUDY ON EMPLOYEE MOTIVATION
projects.description: Project Aim: To study how motivation contributes better performance of the employees in competitors' organization. To know how HR supports the employees. To understand about the general opinion of the employees regarding motivation. To find the effectiveness of employee motivation. To know the effectiveness of performance appraisal system.

projects.name: A STUDY ON THE INFLUENCE OF SOCIAL MEDIA ON CONSUMER BEHAVIOUR
projects.description: Project Aim: To examine the impact of social media on buying behaviour of consumers. To analyse how social media channels affect buying behaviour of consumers. To identify the factors that motivate consumers to shop through social media platforms. To find out which is the best social media platform preferred by customers.
